content:
Mrs. Murdo: Great, it looks like everyone is here now! Let's get started with our first lesson. Today, we'll be learning about the alphabet. Who can tell me the first letter of the alphabet?

Emily: Ooh, I know this one! It's A!

Mrs. Murdo: That's right, Emily! Very good. Now, can anyone tell me the second letter of the alphabet?

Billy: B!

Mrs. Murdo: Excellent job, Billy! You're catching on quickly. Let's continue on and learn the rest of the alphabet together.
